name: Ghost Crawler
description:
This game was made for the First Dani's BasementJam

The theme was: You are what you consume.

Tagline:

Ghost Crawler is an FPS puzzle game, where you play as a ghost seeking vengeance against the Black Knight.

Navigate through the dungeon and defeat him !

Controls:

  • Move using Arrows, zqsd, aswd
  • Left click to possess/ perform an action
  • Right click to release
